name: Private Eye: Greatest Unsolved Mysteries
summary: A nefarious secret society known only as the Enigma Society has been causing trouble around the world; it's up to you to unravel the mystery surrounding them. As the newest Private Eye recruit, you'll travel to exotic international locations and find hidden clues in order to solve some of the world's strangest mysteries! Each new mystery will put your perception skills, as well as your reflexes, to the test! Welcome to the world of Private Eye: Greatest Unsolved Mysteries!
